attributes.action: Have a drop-off zone outside Jamats Academy Ltd, Gloucester
attributes.additional_details:
Jamats Academy Ltd is situated on a very busy road with no available parking within half a mile.

Some attendees are in wheelchairs and have to travel in all weather conditions from wherever there carers can find a parking space.

There is a long bus stop outside Jamats which can be turned in to a suitable drop-off zone and the bus stop moved elsewhere along the long road Jamats is situated.
attributes.background: The Jamats Academy provides a variety of life skills, learning, creative and social activities for young adults and school/college leavers aged 16+ with special needs.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local parking enforcement are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
